name: Python Developer / System Administrator (Pytho)
description:
Python Developer / System Administrator with Python Experience

About Us

We are a German publishing and software company with a strong focus on Amazon Advertising and product sales via Amazon. Our operations are lean, fast-moving, and tech-driven. To support our internal systems and daily technical needs, we are looking for a hands-on system administrator who is proactive and solution-oriented.

Overview

This is a remote, part-time role (15 hrs/week) ideal for a technically skilled all-rounder. You will work on maintaining our internal .NET-based systems, implementing small API updates, solving daily technical issues, and supporting connected devices and tools.

Key Responsibilities

  • Remotely administer and test Android devices and virtual machines.
  • Maintain and optimize internal systems (including .NET, Laravel, Python).
  • Build and operate data aggregation processes via APIs (e.g., TikTok) and web scraping.
  • Implement small technical changes, such as to existing API integrations (e.g., Amazon Advertising, Stripe).
  • Perform scraping and data analysis tasks for reporting and internal research.
  • Identify and implement technical solutions for day-to-day operational needs.

Requirements

  • Solid experience with Python / Laravel
  • Experience in simple IT Administration
  • Familiarity with basic scripting and data scraping (e.g., Python, PowerShell).
  • Ability to manage and troubleshoot devices and tech tools remotely.
  • Hands-on, practical mindset with a focus on reliability and independence.
  • Experience with .NET (C# or VB.NET) and system administration is a nice extra

Nice to Have

  • Experience with REST APIs (e.g., Amazon Ads API, Stripe).
  • Background in e-commerce or Amazon marketplace operations.
  • Basic networking and remote access skills.
  • Experience with workflow automation and technical integration projects.

Why join?

  • A talented, growing team
  • Competitive compensation package
  • High level of responsibility and space to develop
  • Flexible working hours
  • An international team of highly experienced people from top tier companies

IMPORTANT: Please provide us a CV with a short letter of intent.
